alert.note: Alert for Leake; Madison; Rankin; Scott (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 2:54AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Leake, northeastern Rankin, northwestern Scott and southeastern Madison Counties through 400 AM CDT... At 254 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Canton to near Madison to near Pocahontas. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Canton around 300 AM CDT. Sharon around 310 AM CDT. Farmhaven, Goshen Springs and Fannin around 320 AM CDT. Pisgah around 325 AM CDT. Ludlow around 330 AM CDT. Leesburg around 335 AM CDT. Branch around 340 AM CDT. Carthage, Forkville and Tuscola around 345 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Lena and Redwater. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for central Mississippi. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for central Mississippi.
